p: The third panel ‘c’ included the sequences of the Asian genotype from India, Indonesia and Thailand. These strains included sequences from India before 2004 and sequences from the 1960s till the latest available strains of 2017 from other Asian countries such as Indonesia, Malaysia, Philippines and Thailand. Several recently reported CHIKV strains (2012–17) from Brazil, Mexico, Puerto Rico, Columbia, Guatemala, Virgin Islands, New Caledonia, Papua New Guinea and Micronesia also diverged from this group.
